import { useSpring, animated } from 'react-spring' const calc = (x, y) => [-(y - window.innerHeight / 2) / 20, (x - window.innerWidth / 2) / 20, 1.1] const trans = (x, y, s) => `perspective(600px) rotateX(${x}deg) rotateY(${y}deg) scale(${s})` console.log(calc()); const ServicesCard = (props) => { const [propsAni, set] = useSpring(() => ({ xys: [0, 0, 1], config: { mass: 5, tension: 350, friction: 40 } })) return(

{props.header}

{props.content}

Find Our More

) } export default ServicesCard
